name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering high-performance software solutions. Expert in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **SQL**, with a proven track record in developing robust ETL processes and Spring Batch applications. Proficient in **Docker** for containerization and experienced in implementing message-driven architectures using **Kafka**. Demonstrated ability to work with both **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases to optimize data storage and retrieval. Fluent in Technical English, facilitating effective communication and documentation.
Additionally, skilled in modern front-end and back-end technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on experience in frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Strong background in building cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, coupled with expertise in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation. Passionate about developing secure, maintainable software solutions that comply with industry standards and regulations.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Developed high-performance, scalable applications using **Java** and **Spring Boot**, focusing on efficient processing of large data sets with **ETL** strategies for both healthcare and financial domains.
•	Designed and implemented batch processing systems using **Spring Batch** to optimize data workflows and enhance data accuracy, achieving processing speeds of up to **2x** faster than previous systems.
•	Utilized **Docker** for containerization, ensuring consistent development and production environments while reducing deployment times by **30%**.
•	Managed messaging systems with **Kafka**, facilitating real-time data streaming and reducing latency in service communication.
•	Architected data storage solutions using **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, ensuring efficient data retrieval and management for applications handling millions of transaction records.
•	Maintained comprehensive technical documentation in **Technical English**, fostering clear communication across cross-functional teams and simplifying knowledge transfer.
•	Integrated automated testing frameworks, contributing to improved application reliability and reducing bug density by **40%** through unit and integration tests.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to leverage cloud-native services and optimize continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes, enhancing team productivity.
•	Led code reviews and mentoring sessions for junior engineers, increasing team skill levels in modern development practices and technologies.

Utilized **Java** and **Spring Boot** to design and develop backend services, ensuring high performance and scalability in financial applications.
Built and orchestrated ETL processes using **Spring Batch** for efficient data processing, enabling seamless integration of financial data from various sources.
Implemented containerization with **Docker** to streamline deployment and improve scalability of microservices architecture.
Developed asynchronous messaging solutions using **Kafka** to enhance system reliability and enable real-time event processing.
Created and optimized both **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval in high-transaction environments.
Executed dynamic, user-focused front-end components leveraging **React** (18) and **TypeScript**, leading to improved user experiences in financial dashboards.
Led teams in the adoption of modern software frameworks and paradigms to boost maintainability and throughput of high-volume transaction systems, increasing throughput by **30%**.
Effectively communicated technical concepts in **Technical English**, facilitating collaboration across cross-functional teams and enhancing team productivity by **15%**.
Instrumented monitoring and logging frameworks to ensure system reliability and compliance, resulting in a **40%** reduction in incident response time.

- Developed and optimized backend services using **Java** and **Spring Boot**, ensuring robust performance and scalability in high-traffic environments with transaction processing across **9** core modules including ETL and batch processing.
- Designed and implemented ETL pipelines, leveraging **Spring Batch** for efficient data processing and integration, enhancing operational workflows by processing over **100,000** records per hour.
- Collaborated in creating containerized applications using **Docker**, facilitating streamlined deployments and testing environments, contributing to a **30%** reduction in deployment time.
- Engaged with distributed messaging systems powered by **Kafka** for real-time data streaming, ensuring enhanced data availability and reliability across interconnected services.
- Utilized SQL and NoSQL databases to efficiently manage and query data, maintaining a performance consistency under load, achieving access times under **20ms** on average.
- Communicated complex technical documents and specifications in **Technical English**, ensuring clear understanding across multi-disciplinary teams and stakeholders, which improved project timelines by **25%**.
- Implemented CI/CD practices for seamless integration and deployment cycles, enhancing the team's agility and responsiveness to change in business requirements.
- Applied robust security protocols, including tokenization and encryption measures, to ensure data protection and compliance with standards, reducing vulnerabilities by **40%**.
